description: Coefficient of x^(-n) in expansion of continued fraction 0, x, x^2, x^3, x^4, ... .
comments: Absolute values are essentially A227310. - _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Oct 31 2014
formula: G.f.: 1 - 1/G(0), where G(k)= 1 + x^(k+1)/(1 - x^(k+1)/G(k+1) ); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Jun 29 2013G.f.: W(0) - 1, where W(k) = 1 - x^(k+1)/( x^(k+1) - 1/(1 - x^(k+1)/( x^(k+1) + 1/W(k+1) ))); R=1 (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Aug 27 2013
author: Alain Lasjauniasith (lasjauni(AT)math.u-bordeaux.fr.yyy.com)
